website_summaries.verdict: With multiple drawers in 2 sizes, this cabinet can store a variety of small parts, but its stability is an issue.
pros: Perfect for small parts, screws, nuts, washers and more
Back panel can be repurposed for drawer dividers
cons: Some excess plastic from the manufacturing process must be cut away so the drawers can slide properly
Pre-drilled mounting holes don’t match up with standard wall stud spacing
Doesn’t hold heavier items well unless mounted

customer_reviews.title: Good for parts bins
customer_reviews.text: I bought all three (24, 44, 64 bins) as a trio for electronic repair. I have the set stacked and recessed into a unused wall hollow. Be prepared to trim some of the clear excess casting material from the bins. I had to do this on 20% of the bins or they will not slide properly. It only takes 3 seconds, but it must be done.
customer_reviews.author: NW2M - Rockville MD

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego storage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for organizing Lego pieces that aren't bricks! The black dividers help, but I just wish more came with it. I ended up making my own out of the stuff you can find in the craft section at Walmart. (I forget the name, but it's something like loop something mat lol sorry). They worked great as dividers!
customer_reviews.author: Kess_reviews

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item for storing LEGO technic parts. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for storing LEGO technic parts. Although the cabinet and drawers are perfectly suitable for this task, there aren't nearly enough dividers for the drawers. The dividers that come with it are molded into the back of the cabinet and have to be cut out with an exacto knife. After removing the dividers, I had to further scrape and sand down the edges to make them smooth enough to use. I find this to be a very serious flaw in this product. I have noticed that they do sell extra dividers separately, but the price is absurd. THIS ITEM SHOULD INCLUDE ENOUGH DIVIDERS in the box but it does NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Laine

customer_reviews.title: Good for odds and ends.
customer_reviews.text: Good for odds and ends. I used it in my bathroom for my makeup and whatnot. I didn't want to buy one of those makeup containers because I felt like they are too small and wouldn't have enough space, so I gave this a try. The containers are not long enough to fit most of my brushes and eyeliners, so I put my brushes in a mug on top. I think it would work well for jewelry storage also but obviously not in a display form but rather in storage form. You can add labels to each container fairly easily. It's also pretty sturdy but you can attach it to a wall if you so choose. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Great but need more dividers.
customer_reviews.text: They are working very good. Did not come with many dividers so I had to 3d print some extras. If you have 3d printer and need more you can DL my thing.
customer_reviews.author: John Cutburth II

customer_reviews.title: 44 Drawers but only 12 Dividers
customer_reviews.text: This does not include enough dividers for the drawers. There are 32 small drawers and only 8 dividers. There are 12 large drawers and only 4 plastic dividers. Need more? They sell the dividers separately. Large drawer dividers are 6 for $10, and small dividers are 16 for $8. So budget an extra $36 for dividers if you want dividers for every drawer. This is beyond ridiculous. These go back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Ample storage but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Compact design with ample storage space Cons: - Feels cheap and flimsy. - Drawers fall out easily as the stopper on some of the drawers seem to be non existent. Best thing to do is NOT pull out straight but at a downward angle (see video). - Not enough dividers included in the package.
customer_reviews.author: par5

customer_reviews.title: Not what they use to be
customer_reviews.text: These use to be fairly good units, however sometime between 2016 and now they changed something about their manufacturing process and the drawers are horrible. Issues with the molding process of these has left excess material that has bleed out from all edges of the drawers causing them to stick when trying to slide them in and out. It’s especially annoying when you end up dumping all the stuff you just sorted on the floor because of this. In order to correct this you not only have to cut off the excess, but slightly sand down the top edges to make them work as they should.
customer_reviews.author: LipsticknSmile

customer_reviews.title: Dividers/Dividers
customer_reviews.text: For a product made from plastic it appears to be pretty sturdy. The only problem is the product appears to come with dividers.. Well after contacting the sell I'm made aware that the dividers are embedded in the back of the frame. Now I have to cut them out. The description should be changed to reflect that rather than say they dividers included. I can get more that are clear rather than black as a separate purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rak

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy drawers, easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy drawers, easy to hang. Drawers have a lip on the end so they don't accidentally pull out all the way, but you can also take them all the way out just by lifting up the end. Using these to organize Legos. My kids have loved them and being able to find small pieces easily.
customer_reviews.author: La Rubia

customer_reviews.title: Great for Arduino and assorted electrical goodies.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to organize some of my electronic stuff, and this fits 90% of my needs. I did not show it in the pictures, but the HackRF just barely does NOT fit due to the SMA connectors. My only real complaint is the way they mold the back... they mold the dividers into a back piece you "cut" out, which isn't a big deal... but regardless of which kit you purchase, it includes both large and small dividers. Even if you get a kit with only small drawers, they include both large and small dividers. (as opposed to just giving you more small dividers and 0 large)
customer_reviews.author: Joe McGlothin

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Light Weight, Won't Rust
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty lightweight, even for plastic. The drawers are plastic as well, which means they don't really feel like they fit particularly well. They don't fall out or anything, but unless there's something heavy in them they feel flimsy and feel more like you're yanking the plastic drawer out rather than sliding out towards you. Since it's plastic it will never rust, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lebowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing LEGO!
customer_reviews.text: The drawers are really going to help me organize my LEGO collection. I'm pleased with the variety of drawer sizes and how smoothly they come out. And there are slots on the back you can snap off to make drawer dividers; an unexpected bonus! The only downside is that the drawers can easily come all the way out so I'll have to be careful not to spill my pieces on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Trax

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken but usable
customer_reviews.text: Amazon makes it very difficult to contact the seller so its easier to just write a poor review  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄ Sounds bad but I honestly rate this at 2 stars. I love Akro Mils storage bins and I figured this would be a quality product but it arrived broken, shattered really. I can still use the storage bins but the plastic on the back of the unit has a large crack running from top to bottom. The packaging is just a box so I'm not surprised. The plastic is floppy and the whole thing looks and feels cheap. It will work for what I need but I didn't spend the money to receive a broken item.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mero

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was much better and sturdier than I thought it was going to be. I read a lot of reviews that made me wonder if it was too cheap and flimsy. The plastic is fairly hard, the drawers are very deep, and it should fulfill the average person's storage needs for a garage or a craft room. I use it for screws. This is for sure worth the <30 dollars I paid and exceeded my expectations. No matter what, anchor it. If you dont want to anchor it, buy a metal one that is heavy enough to not tip over. If you anchor this, you will be fine
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not a heavy duty cabinet, but works satisfactorily
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this cabinet. I store only light weighted nuts, screws, etc. in it and it works fine. I'm not sure whether it would be satisfactory if filled with heavier items, but for me it was a good buy. The larger drawers would be a little better if they were deeper. I'm not sure how the cabinet would hold up over a long period of time, but I don't anticipate having any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: xplorer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product/design, but still overpriced overall if you include the dividers.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product overall and does its job. However, thr quality is a bit dodgy, yet again, you do ger what you pay for! What REALLY ticks me off is how much they’re charging for dividers, it’s crazy. No way should this be supported. I’m going to make a six slot divider for the small compartments which will house all my electric components. Going to use bolsa wood and if anyone is interested these look like a great alternative for dividers at a much more reasonable cost:  Looking at their dimensions they would only need some minor trimming which is easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: TheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and well manufactured
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of these on the market and this one is the best one I've seen yet. The screw holes are easy to use, the drawers are trapped so that they can't fall through the back of the case. It's all plastic so there's nothing to rust like some of my old metal ones. And the plastic is good quality. I'll definitely buy this brand again next time I need one of these.
customer_reviews.author: SamIAm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic drawers until you bump it, then everything falls out
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why this product receives such high reviews. Read the question/answers. I purchased two of these. Filled them up with my nuts/screws/bolts/etc. My dog bumped the shelf-- and half the drawers slid out and onto the floor!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cernese

customer_reviews.title: Up to the task for heavy hardware
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these units packed full of various hardware. One of these cabinets can be quite heavy, and the frame and drawers are up to the task. The first unit I ordered has a slot in each corner for hanging on a wall. The two follow-on units have an additional center slot on the top rail. This is important to prevent a heavy cabinet from bowing in the middle. It is apparently an engineering upgrade over older units, and is much appreciated. There are drawer dividers molded into the rear panel and must be cut loose with heavy scissors if needed. I will always use Arko-Mills products for my storage needs.
customer_reviews.author: jabit

customer_reviews.title: Good option for hobbyists with lots of little parts
customer_reviews.text: I tinker with guitars and effects pedals.... so I have a lot of little parts and doo-dads around all the time. This is perfect - I don't need it blast-proof, and I'm not planning on dragging it behind a car down a dirt road, so the build is sufficient for my needs. If I were using it to store lots of sharp things, or extremely dense things, maybe I'd want it bulkier. But this is fine for my purposes, and probably won't ever need replacing unless it receives a direct hit from a parachuting rhino. Which I feel is.......unlikely.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Montross

customer_reviews.title: Expected for Plastic, but Good Overall
customer_reviews.text: This is all plastic, which makes the storage very light. I'm not storing very dense parts either, so it has a risk of tipping or being moved easily. The build quality is as expected for its price. The plastic should not break if you take care of it. If it is stretched or something is forced into each bin, it will most likely break. There are not many dividers for how many bins there are, so keep in mind when purchasing. Despite all this, it does its job perfectly for me. I am holding small electrical components and project parts in every bin. It has not failed or broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: This has a major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The price is right, hence some stars. It also fits well in the shelving unit I have. Nothing else is good about it. It is flimsy, unstable, and the small drawers dislodge easily if you are using this unit. It will probably be a little more stable once filled up, but in an earthquake or if you move the shelving and this easily falls over, your nick nacks will be all over the floor. Had I to do it over, I would have put more money into a more stable unit, but that would involve going to a hardware store where you can actually feel the quality. Not any quality to feel here.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Chris

customer_reviews.title: A good addition to my garage.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compartments. Sturdy. I didn't like the punch-out back, but I mounted this on the wall in the garage so that didn't really matter. I didn't need to punch out the divider tabs, as they were kind of brittle and some cracked. I just threw most of them away, as I already liked the drawer sizes undivided.
customer_reviews.author: dreamhow

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these and stacked them. I had a counter area in the utility room and measured, then ordered these that I hoped would fit perfectly in that space, and they did. The selection is great, and I plan on ordering more. They are well-made and work as expected. Now there is a drawer for everything from sockets to screws to nails to odds and ends that were cluttering up the counter and drawers and stuck in coffee cans. You couldn't find anything before, and now, all organized! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee F.

customer_reviews.title: Used to clean up and Organize Lego's, Part 2
customer_reviews.text: Same quality I always get from Akro Mills. This was one of 2 storage cabinets I bought to sort and organize my kids' Legos. These two cabinets were the same dimensions biut this one had larger bins for that I needed for the more common bricks where as the other caboinet wer all small bins for all of the hard to find and specialty pieces. Together they look great and are very functional. As always you can sit them on a table or shelf or mount them to the wall
customer_reviews.author: WVD

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing!
customer_reviews.text: This storage box is awesome! So many compartments, exactly as described. Extra benefit is that it came fully put together. All I did was slide out of the box and sit in place. I used this to organize Legos in the playroom. My daughter even loved being able to sort them by color. Soooo much better than the big box the legos were originally shoved in. She even used the upper compartments for special ones like wheels.
customer_reviews.author: ars6569

customer_reviews.title: Awesome small part storage
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this product. This is the PERFECT solution to having a large amount of storage for small items. Just to give some ideas: Small electronics, resistors, capacitors, usb drives, cables, blades, screws, small hand tools, etc. I also HIGHLY suggest if you have a 3d printer to print out the drawer dividers. You can find the .stl on Thingiverse by searching "Akro-Mils". This product is awesome and I highly suggest it
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: Best LEGO Storage Solution EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a very old lady with a 4-year-old budding engineer great-grandson. He graduated from Duplo months ago and finding a useful solution to the ever-growing LEGO collection was becoming an issue. This storage cabinet is the perfect solution. We can pull out the bins he needs for his project, keeping them sorted for ease in finding the right part. I now understand why the Akro-Mils storage cabinet came up in my search for LEGO storage! I must also thank all the other folks who bought it for that purpose for so many positive reviews. Made my choice easy!
customer_reviews.author: Joan M DeVillier

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no surprises
customer_reviews.text: I've put this to great use since receiving it. It's just as described, no surprises. Plenty of connectors on back to hang from wall. Stays put. Drawers are just as described. I think some others have commented about dividers . . . but really, why would you buy dividers when you can just as easily make them with some stiff paper? Or even from plastic packaging that you'd otherwise throw away (like the kind that you'd expect to find scissors packaged in). Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace some of the storage bins that were either missing trays or they were broken. I ended up condensing 4-5 of my old bins into this one unit. The old bins were made of a hard plastic that would break or crack easily. The plastic trays in this unit are more pliable and won't break as easily. The only negatives I can think of is that the tray dividers are molded into the back of the unit and you have to cut them apart. And there isn't near enough of the dividers.
customer_reviews.author: coach316dc

customer_reviews.title: Finally an Organizer that fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: I love my organizers how did I get through before without them? Thank you for the fast shipping. I've seen these in garages storing tools for men or women. Never did I think of using these for an office in the home. I recommend these to anyone wanting some organization anywhere. Oct. 3, 2020 I noticed while putting it up on the wall that the back support was broken. It will still work but packing for these has to be updated or changed.
customer_reviews.author: LORENA

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but feels cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Product basically as advertised, but feels very lightweight and cheap. The drawers have no "bump" or "snap" to keep them shut - picking up and moving the unit will make the drawers randomly slide out. Overall feels very loose and rattley. The drawers really should fit more snugly and say closed.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Organizer
customer_reviews.text: My Husband makes bracelets and has 10 million beads, closures, charms, etc. Offended that I had to share my office space with him, I purchased 2 of these to encourage him at least stay organized. He has the compartments labeled and filling these up has kept him from having to purchase separate smaller containers. I'm glad I measured before purchasing because they are large, but we needed the large size. These would be great for garages, shops, craft rooms, kids art materials, you name it!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great for Garage Storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing all the knick-knacks that accumulate in the garage. Sturdy and well-made. The two sizes of drawers are great to accommodate most anything you have floating around. The drawers are a little clouded, kinda like the plastic on tupperware containers. But, I think it is ok because you can still see what you have inside and they hopefully won't yellow over time like the clear older cabinets I had that seemed to crack every time I opened them.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Love it BUT
customer_reviews.text: The 5 stars is for storage capacity and sturdiness BUT this is a heavy item when you have all your stuff inside. It would be helpful if it came with its own hooks that works best with it to hang it safely. I’m still struggling to find the best nails that works. Can you guys help suggesting what to use? Or can amazon send me the appropriate nails/hooks?
customer_reviews.author: DealORnoDeal

customer_reviews.title: Came with one crack on the top inside. Some plastic is not cut off of the drawers, very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Look like good nice drawers and are stack-able, which is very convenient and helpful. It has some problems though, it is made with cheep plastic that is not cut properly, and has a crack on the top inside of the cabinet that is reported in other reviews so I think this is a consistent problem, though it appears to not change the functionality of it which is good, but when you receive yours be sure to watch out and look for it. I have attached some photos that I recommend that you look at.
customer_reviews.author: Eilat

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing small, miscellaneous items
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this in house to store various items that I use frequently and smaller items requiring protection. This works great. Some of the items I store in it include electronic device charging cables, navigation compass, hiking GPS, window air conditioner remotes, lens cleaning pen, adapters, point and shoot camera, and many other items. This drawer system works perfectly to store, organize, and protect all of these items. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: NOT rugged and NOT unbreakable.
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers wrote, this thing is extremely weak. I think if I filled it full of hardware (which is its entire purpose) it would fail. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to organize and hold my mosaic pieces for art work. I have it backed up to a cabinet side on a table top and it works perfectly to keep my glass organized and easily available. You can easily remove the drawers to take them to your workspace, and easily slide them back in when done. The dividers for the larger drawers work well. They are initially (when shipped) attached to the back of the unit. You just snap them off and install them accordingly. Take care when snapping them off. The drawers are a plastic that has some give to it but rigid enough to hold it's contents with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Eckels

customer_reviews.title: it's nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's nice and sturdy, I like that a lot, the only thing that really annoyed me is the fact that someone thought it would be a good idea to leave a small hole in each of the drawers... now forgive me if I'm wrong, but these small drawers are meant to hold small things, tiny things, things that would fit into small drawers - right? So, you can imagine my surprise when I poured some beads into one of the drawers and they all started falling out of the hole and rolling across my work space. I had to put tape on each of the holes. Other than that, it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: RoseRed

customer_reviews.title: Great for Storing small items
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I am using to store an ever growing lego collection - I didn't realize at first that there are dividers on the back which make it even better! Just pull them off and insert into the small and large drawers. Since there aren't many dividers and I needed more, I just traced the shape out onto a cardboard Amazon box and it works perfectly...If you have small items to store I highly recommend! Unfortunately I have too many of the larger Lego bricks to store so I have to use additional storage, but this works for most of what I have.
customer_reviews.author: jeepgrrrl

customer_reviews.title: They're of more like a Sterilite material
customer_reviews.text: This little chest of drawers sits atop my desk and holds things I'm always foraging for in my desk drawers. It organizes large trombones, medium trombones, cross-clips, bulletin board tacks, postage stamps, scrap paper/note pads, bird cage hardware, various sizes of legal clips, etc. The plastic drawers are the kind that do not shatter when dropped. They're of more like a Sterilite material. Drawers, unlike other brands, remove and reinsert easily. I bought Avery labels for labeling the drawers, making the item very attractive indeed. It does not look industrial (like it belongs in the workshop) sitting on my desk. Very organized looking.
customer_reviews.author: WriteRight2016

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well built.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Akro-Mils products for a while, This product is well built and holds up to the use. It is a great parts bin, i like the fact that the large bines are divided the long way which allows the use of the full depth of the drawer. I have a couple of them mounted to the wall, one is filled with rivets and snaps. it was later when i wanted to relocate the bin that i realize it weight 60lbs. It never sagged or failed for the 2 year it was on the wall, I have purchased a few of this model. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice Organizers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to bring order to the khaos that was the vast collection of small assorted hardware that was scattered about the shelves in my garage. They are quality products, and the dividers for the drawers are molded right into the backs of the units in case you want them later. The drawers work well and don't fall out accidentally, but can be removed easily of you want to by pulling them upward. Nice products 👌
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Tons of storage for different sizes/types of screws, nails, washers, and other small hardware. The drawers have stops so you don't pull it out unless you want to. If you do want to pull it out all you have to do is tilt the drawer up and pull. I was surprised when I discovered small plastic partitions attatched to the back of the unit. Cut them apart and slide them into the drawers to divide drawers in half. Large drawers divide left to right, small drawers divide front to back. The unit also has holes for wall hanging, which I took advantage of so it takes up no precious work bench space.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. Pullen

customer_reviews.title: It serves its purpose and have opened up a lot of space in 6 drawers.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice for the money but I wouldn’t say heavy duty. It served its purpose of freeing up a lot of space in 6 separate drawers. Also I now won’t buy duplicates of what I already have cause I can easily see and get to what I actually own. I have put some heavy metal objects and it is holding. My only recommendation is it should come with at least 10 more large and small dividers. I purchased dividers and the cost was half the price of the actual unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Pochopien

customer_reviews.title: The size of the unit and the drawers was exactly what I needed and would love to have given this a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold the charms and findings I use in my jewelry business. The size of the unit and the drawers was exactly what I needed and would love to have given this a 5 star rating. Unfortunately, this is a very flimsy item. Charms would fall from the drawers and get stuck behind the unit so my husband attached some luan board to the back of it to give it some strength. It works now but I would have much rather had a metal cabinet or something more solid. Unfortunately I couldnt find anything anywhere that would serve the function I needed and be substantial too. So it is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn L. Payson

customer_reviews.title: Good value with plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: This isn't super sturdy, so you have to be careful not to tip it. It holds plenty of tats for screws and bolts, and some larger ones at the bottom. It took me a while to realize that the dividers are attached to the back side. Once you take these off, there's not much left for backing. The drawers stay in pretty well, but are not locked, so you have to be careful not to tip the unit.
customer_reviews.author: T.av

customer_reviews.title: Super Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for the amount of loose stuff that needed to be in one place. Plenty of storage for all those items. Just wish the storage drawers were a little bit longer. Both cabinets came packaged in separate boxes that were then shipped in an outer carton. Cabinets are of decent quality . Took quite a while to get all the loose stuff organized in these cabinets but it was well worth it. If you can't remember where you put things like a certain screw type, wire nut or small tool you need it's nice to have it all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D

customer_reviews.title: Good, soliid product
customer_reviews.text: I've been extensively using Akro-Mils storage products for almost fifty years. As a compulsive pack-rat I own more than 100 or them. They've gotten away from the polystyrene drawers which were subject to breakage when mishandled, but the newer drawers aren't as secure when drawn from the cabinet. For enclosed drawer parts cabinets (it keeps the dust down) Akro-Mils is the premier manufacturer. Their design lends to stacking and hanging on a wall panel.
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this a 5 star rating but I'm taking one star off for the lack of a back on the unit. That being said, I absolutely love it! The drawers function smoothly, there are 2 sizes which are currently holding all of my jewelry tools and The only real complaint is that there is a tiny hole in the bottom of each drawer. Easily rectified with a simple piece of scotch tape. I plan to attach a simple foam core backing and this unit will be the bomb diggety dog!
customer_reviews.author: Jace Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and good assortment of drawers, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: My old parts organizers started to break since the drawers were made of brittle plastic. I like the size of this organizer and the fact that the drawers are soft / pliable plastic. I also like the balance of small and large drawers, although it could come with more dividers. However, the frame is poor quality and looks terrible, but more importantly, it sags in the middle as you load it up. I ended up sliding a piece of plastic under the middle to help prop it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Limited versatility.  Very expensive if you need dividers inside the drawers.
customer_reviews.text: There is only one divider spot per drawer. Small drawers are divided in half side to side, large drawers are divided in half length wise making them exactly the same width as the small drawers. The cabinet didn't come with any dividers, so after purchasing them (2 set for the large drawers at 10.00 each. I can't remember how many sets I had to buy for the small drawers) this was a very expensive product with VERY limited versatility. I defiantly would look elsewhere before purchasing this product! I am sure you could get a better product, cheaper at Home Depot or Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great CabinetsI re
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and a 64 drawer version, they are great quality, light yet sturdy. I will be buying more of these when I figure out where I'm going to mount them. If you need more dividers and have a 3D printer or know someone with a 3D printer, look up dividiers on the usual sites. There's one print model that has many different divider combinations for the small and large drawers that would be ideal for sectioning these drawer up into smaller portions for very small electronics and small hardware.
customer_reviews.author: jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something heavy-duty, this is not the product for you. But if you just need something light to hold various small objects, such as craft supplies, I would recommend this. I got this for my husband who needed a place to keep nails, nuts and bolts, and it seems to be working pretty well. It's made entirely of a rather flimsy plastic, so it would not work well for anything very heavy. But it's a good organizer and my husband likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Gale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for seed savers organization!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered several of these now to make a seed storing area for all my garden seeds I save and collect. I love how organized everything is now. Having different sizes of drawers works perfectly for different sizes of seeds. Each drawer comes with a tiny vent hole in it so I did have to cover that up with a small sticker so that no seeds would fall through. I fit them all in a cheap little child’s bookcase for stability. Very versatile little unit that could be used for many things! Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: skip it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really pay attention to the dimensions, which wasn't very smart of me, as I planned to use this in my classroom. It's perfect for a lot of things- bandaids, erasers, and anything else that's tiny. However, I planned to use a drawer for highlighters and pencils. They won't fit in it very well. I am considering sending it back as I paid $40 for it. It definitely isn't worth the price! The drawers just slide out. There's nothing holding them in at all. I would skip this one and find something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: KPearce

customer_reviews.title: True to description. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with the purchase. The storage container arrived very quickly and in perfect condition. The drawers are deep and well-suited for sorting and storing items of various sizes. It’s sturdy and I think it would be acceptable for a workshop, but it’s also suitable for in-home use including in a children’s room (no sharp edges from the mounding process like on some plastic tubs).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy storage
customer_reviews.text: It is made of plastic so don't expect to store too many heavy items but it is priced right. I used it on a desk and it fit perfectly below the shelf (height-wise at least) - before this I was hopelessly lost with all manner of wire, screw, tape, solder, hot glue spread all about my apt. Now that I have a bit of organization I feel more refreshed, I sleep better at night and my teeth are whiter. Thanks Akro-Mils!
customer_reviews.author: LTLTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No dividers and way more flimsy than earlier made products
customer_reviews.text: The plastic material used is way more flimsy/less sturdy and the trays aren't as see-through as compared to earlier made storage units made by the same company. The unit didn't come with any dividers, although the description & other reviewers indicates that is does come with a few. I won't trust this storage unit to any real weight of storage items or high expectancy of long-life before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gore

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 of these, and have to say they are great storage cases. The only reason I removed one star is that I had one broken drawer, and they are open in the back with results that if you want to move the case, all your items can get shaken out. This should not be an issue when attached to a wall, but it was causing me some trouble when I wanted to move them with all the drawers inserted. They do stack very well too, and are American made. I'll get more of these when my collection grows.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I would like for the plastic to have been more of a clear than a frost. SOme items are hard to see with drawers closed. It does NOT come with enough dividers for the drawers as many have already alluded to, so I just made my own with paper folders doubled and taped. I also laminated a sheet of card stock and cut it, works pretty well. Overall, it has nice storage.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent product. Good size, depth and base for an organizer. I bought this to organize my work bench. I had too many random boxes of nails and such. So everything is in a labeled system now. There are brackets for dividers in each drawer, but it didn't come with any. So, I guess i will have to buy them separate. I thought that was weird. Overall it's exactly what i needed and it works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn F

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizaing kids Lego
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on how people used these to organize legos, we decided to give it a try. Kids love lego again! because they now can easily find what they need and can help organize and put back after finishes playing. Whoever came up with the idea of using this to organize lego is amazing! By the way, just spent extra bucks to buy these instead of knock off ones, these drawers slide in/out smoother and more sturdy as a whole. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: PeiPei

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sandpaper Organization
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store 3 different types of sandpaper disks in the 2 and 3 inch size - this is well built and very handy when "running" through all the grits. I have yet to wall mount it (no more wall space to be had) so I carry it from one location to the next (workbench and lathe) - I would recommend it for this reason/use alone - other might use it for another purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Birsel Prime

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Our garage storage situation was a nightmare - this is EXACTLY what I needed to organize all our screws, nails, bits and bobs. It's perfect and I would definitely order again! My only note is that I wish they offered this in white or other colors. Our home is very neutral in color so the black isn't my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged, Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: *Update*: I finally learned how to use my eyes and found the drawer dividers on the back on the item. You have to break them off and then cut the plastic to get the drawer inserts. I still stand by my stance that this item was not worth the money, and I have had no contact with the company. Item arrived covered in scratches and missing drawer dividers, which really sucks because Ive been waiting on this item for two weeks as well. Not worth the money in my opinion. Seems to be able to hold quite a bit of items, but can’t guarantee it’s the sturdiest once full.
customer_reviews.author: RidicCritic

customer_reviews.title: Drawers need a tab to keep them from opening all the way
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good for the price, except very annoying that the drawers will pull all the way out very easily, so it's easy to end up dumping a bunch of small parts all over the floor. All the ones like this I've had in the past have the back part a bit higher, so you need to tilt the front up to remove or replace the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Marty d'FriedTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: perfect for storing my LipSense Inventory and other testers and inventory! Cons: if taking on-the-go the back has holes that the product sometimes falls out during transport Overall: love it and recommend to my fellow Distributors!
customer_reviews.author: Amber K.

customer_reviews.title: I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of Akro-Mils products, but this item does not work well. It is flimsy, doesn't hold its contents very well, and is not worth $30 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Magnate

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to buy these organization bins any time I need parts storage. I have used these extensively and there is nothing bad to say about them. The back panel of the bin itself has molded in drawer dividers you can cut out and put in the drawers to split multiple parts in each drawer. You can hang them on a wall or set them on a shelf or tabletop. These are well worth the money. Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: NCBirdman

customer_reviews.title: Organizational Dream!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this thing. I bought them to organize/store my collection of D&D miniatures, and it's literally the best solution I've found. The individual drawers are very deep, so it's beneficial to buy the separately sold dividers (even the larger drawers). For example, I have a drawer for Dwarf minis, but also divide the drawer in half to separate the genders. Allowing this level of logical division makes it so much easier to find specific minis when needed. Furthermore, they fit perfectly on the shelves of my game closet perpendicularly, not parallel. So I have several of them in my closet side-by-side, like you would with books, making a perfect filing system.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 years ago and liked it so much a bought a second one to match. Unfortunately, the quality control has gone downhill. The edges of the plastic drawer pulls have a lot of extra plastic “tabs” left over instead of being finished smooth like the first one. Somebody put these drawers in like this and thought they would be acceptable. Image comparison - Added a photo of the original drawers and 2 photos of the new ones that show some of the bad edges. Overall seems more cheaply made and I would not recommend this product going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good product, wrong color delivered
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement of the same unit I bought many years ago from a retail store. The original was fully loaded, knocked off a 5' shelf onto cement floor & the frame was compromised. It was a bit wobbly but still functional. Over the years I lost or damaged a few draws, so this was a good time to replace it. My only 2 minor complaints about this purchase was receiving the wrong color and my Prime 2 day delivery guarantee was not honored. It took 7 days to receive for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: tennis_nut-7

customer_reviews.title: Classroom Supply Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this organizer to organize the supplies in my classroom. The organizer makes it easier for both my students and I to find items that we need in during a lesson/activity. I was a little upset when I realized that the larger drawers do not fit pencils. However, the larger drawers do fit expo and permanent markers.
customer_reviews.author: Eloradanan

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing small parts
customer_reviews.text: I've had a smaller version in my office, and needed something for my garage. The bottom fits perfectly into my Craftsman toolbench shelf so it is very securely anchored at the bottom, and with a little bit of thing wire I was easily able to anchor the top as well. The drawers are easily removable--just tilt them upwards when you hit the stop. But the stop prevents them from accidentally being pulled/dumped out. The fronts are easy to label (I used a label maker, but a Sharpie works well, too).
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reigrut

customer_reviews.title: Major Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product!Came with slots but NO dividers were included!! If not mounted on the wall the drawers tip forward with the contents spilling out as each drawer is not closed properly with a hinge!Each drawer is loose!Designed by dummies!I was really hopeful that I was getting a well designed organiser but was totally disappointed!Acro Mills pls make improvements in your design if you want people to actually buy your product and be happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Anin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing Legos
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter prefers to build her Lego creations based not only on shape, but also color. Being able to keep the colors sorted saves hours of storing time, leaving more time for building. It is exactly as described. Not the sturdiest unit that might exist, but more than adequate for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price, but somewhat poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap plastic and poor design. I wish the back was solid. I didn't realize the back side is pretty much wide open. Decent quality for price, but wish it had a full back panel to make it more sturdy. The drawer dividers are clever and handy to have, but the fact you have to "punch them" out of the little bit of plastic that is on the back, I am going to leave them there for extra back support in lieu of actually using them in the drawers unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great for nuts, bolts, etc!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these small parts organizers. This one has a ton of storage and the plastic drawers are nice and deep unlike some of the other ones I've seen. There is a slight sag in the bottom once this has been loaded full with nuts, bolts, washers, etc...but not enough to matter IMO. Mounted easily to the wall and drawers all open easily and correctly even loaded full!
customer_reviews.author: ballouskys

customer_reviews.title: Good bins, no dividers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bins they are the prefect size for my table and works well for my projects. It lost a star because the description says it came with four dividers, but there are no dividers in this package. There’s no way they fell or anything, so the description is just wrong. I would have ordered some if I knew it didn’t come with any.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Masters

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice little drawers
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice little drawers. They're very deep and slide easily. My one complaint is that there isn't much, if any, space on the black plastic part to slap a label about the drawer contents. I'd rather put a label there than on a drawer because then the labels would be all lined up nicely (hey, if you're buying this, you're probably anal too. Don't judge).
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product with many uses
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with many uses. I purchased the Akro-Mils 10144 D 20x16x6 1/2 inch cabinet. I was happy to pay the $26.61 for it and thought it had been double shipped. When I went to contact the seller I noticed it was indeed for 2 of them! My son uses his for computer parts, different screws etc. There is plenty of room to store it all. I am going to use the other for my beads, brads, eyelets, everything crafty. Would order again from this seller. They came quickly and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS JUST GREAT, TONS OF STORAGE!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! Came a day early, and in perfect condition. It has a lot more storage room than I had envisioned and is very sturdy. I read the reviews stating that the drawers can fall out if the unit is tipped, and that is true. The stop lip is quite small, so you do have to be careful not to tip the unit forward. Ok, I will be careful. For the price, this is a great buy and I will probably order more.
customer_reviews.author: CINDERBLOCK STUDIO

customer_reviews.title: Drawers fall out all the time
customer_reviews.text: Ugh I missed the return window on this. This is very lightweight and the drawers have no stopper on them at all so they fall out all the time, and then I have to take time to reorganize my fasteners. I've kicked or lightly stepped on a few of the drawers and broken them- very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O.

customer_reviews.title: Useful for storing lots of small items
customer_reviews.text: Useful for storing lots of small items. I just wish that the frame had separators built in above the drawers. These units are completely open so the drawers support each other and aren't covered at all. This means if the unit falls over or tips, all of your smaller items will fall out the top of the drawers. It also means that bulkier items catch on the drawer above, and on the frame as you try to pull the drawer out. Other than that, it's a decent storage unit, and there don't seem to be any better alternatives available.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Merk

customer_reviews.title: Decent Storage Option for Hobbyists
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to use for storing model paints and supplies. In this role, it's been adequate, giving me a large number of drawers to hold a variety of supplies. Since the drawers are clear, it's easy to identify what's in each one, and the larger drawers can be split with included dividers that snap out of the back of the cabinet case. If I had one complaint, I'd make the drawers all slightly larger, to better accommodate certain supplies. 4/5 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristoffer Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well made storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace some other akro-mills bins that have been sitting in the window sill of my garage for past 5 years. The sun finally disintegrated the backs of the little clear plastic bins, but the black frame is just as sturdy from day one. This gets 5-stars for that simple fact. The Florida sun is relentless. The new ones are going where they are protected from the sun so I don’t see any future issues. I am sure they will give me many years of sturdy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Parts Storage
customer_reviews.text: There is an amazing amount of storage space in this little unit! The drawers are deep and stay in place. It was easy to hang on my wall with 4 wall anchors and screws (not included). There are no instructions with the unit, so know that there are 4 sets of drawer dividers molded into the back of the unit. They need to be removed by bending or cutting the plastic. I used a label maker with 1/2” tape to print labels for each drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Seems good. Sturdy enough to last a good long while from what I can tell. I wish it had come with a template for the screws. Since it didn't, I had to remove a bunch of the drawers and mark the wall through the cabinet its-self. It wasn't the end of the world but a paper template would have made it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good but drawers need attention
customer_reviews.text: These organizers are pretty good. I originally ordered 2, but filled them up and bought 2 more. For the most part these are great quality, but I think there could be better quality control on the drawers. I had to cut excess plastic from the mold process off of several of the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: JP Steph

customer_reviews.title: Just 1 con, otherwise greata
customer_reviews.text: This is a storage with many drawers of different sizes. Works great and serves the purpose i bought it for. Only thing id want different is if the draws didnt fall out was easy. Sometimes i forget and keep putting it out all the way. If there was like a stopper for that it would have been nice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kim

customer_reviews.title: Red or black, this is great!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this for the red version, but it's still a great item. The red was better for crafts while the black is more for nuts and bolts. I preferred the red as a gift for someone into crafts and I know first hand she uses it everyday and loves it. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: LaineyBell

customer_reviews.title: Not enough dividers...unless you pay!
customer_reviews.text: The storage drawers themselves are fine. The problem is that there are very few dividers included. There are 8 small ones molded into the back of the cabinet and 4 large ones and it's difficult to get them off. You can buy extras, but the price is ridiculous. Almost $12 for 16 small dividers, then $15 for 8 large dividers. It's outrageous!! These loose dividers should have been included in the set. Charging nearly 1/3 of the price of the entire cabinet for little plastic dividers is ridiculous. I'll figure out something else, but Akro-Mills needs to re-think their business ethics.
customer_reviews.author: Brucester

customer_reviews.title: Helped Organize The Garage!
customer_reviews.text: This unit - along with another from the same company - helped me organize the mess of loose screws, drill bits, electronics, washers, etc - all the stuff that was all over my garage. Even though these are plastic they are very sturdy and the draws open and close without much a problem. Did the job for me. Thinking of buying a few more for my son's Lego collection.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Prisco

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking this was going to be a bit bigger, but I'm still suped impressed with the product I received! I was looking for some crafting supply storage and this is the perfect find for the smaller items! It looks clean, is functional, and is actually a pretty good size for under/around my desk. I imagine it is fairly easy to pack away if it needed to be hidden away in a closet or in storage and I even had no trouble getting labels on the drawers for easy finding of items!! I definitely recommend this product and I will be looking into their other sizes and products as I continue my craft room/office organization!
customer_reviews.author: K Rusher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, high quality, compact storage for small things
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store my sewing thread. It was hard to tell from the picture whether the spools would fit. Most of them do. The small size spools fit up to 6 per drawer; the larger size fit up to 4. The super size spools only fit in the wider drawers at the bottom. The plastic drawers are well formed - no sharp nibs that will snag things - and they are mostly transparent. Clear enough to see what's inside, but the sturdy, smooth plastic means it is not completely clear. These are NOT the flimsy plastic that will crack easily. The dividers are attached to the back, but I didn't need them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful for organizing
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how much "clutter" this would get rid of in my room, but this thing has been amazing. Since organizing all of the little things in my room I know where every small object is whenever I need it and there aren't a whole bunch of random items scattered across my room. There are enough drawers that you can categorize things however you want and still have enough distinct drawers for things. Keep in mind though that if you are going to be putting any tools in this, they will need to be the miniature version of those tools as my small pair of needle nose pliers barely fit in the larger drawers
customer_reviews.author: galtero

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best storage solution I've ever seen. Plenty of drawers for lots of bits and bobs. Sturdy plastic frame with flexible plastic drawers. All this for just under $30. You can't beat it. Comparable storage solutions from electronics retailers cost $40- 150 bucks! That's ridiculous. Especially since thier boxes are always so fragile and crap.
customer_reviews.author: Skumdog

product_meta.title: Akro-Mils 10144 D 20-Inch by 16-Inch by 6-1/2-Inch Hardware and Craft Cabinet, Black
product_meta.description: These rugged plastic cabinets organize and protect supplies. Cabinet stacks securely and have keyhole slots for hanging on a wall. Clear dividable drawers offer easy content identification. Perfect for small parts storage, toy bricks, office supplies, crafts, beads, hardware, fishing, classroom supplies and more. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: CABINET DIMENSIONS- 20-Inch x 6-3/8 Inch x 10-1/4 Inch, DRAWER DIMENSIONS- 6-Inch x 2-1/4 Inch x 1-5/8 Inch (small drawer), 6-Inch x 4-1/2-Inch x 2-3/16-Inch (large drawer)
HIGH QUALITY- Rugged, high-impact polystyrene plastic frame and 44 drawers
GREAT FOR– Storing and organizing classroom or office supplies, crafts, beads or sewing supplies, hardware, lego and small toy storage, fishing gear and more
STACK OR WALL MOUNT- Cabinets stack securely and can also be wall mounted using keyhole slots molded into the back of the cabinet

DIVIDABLE DRAWERS- 8 small drawer dividers, 4 large drawer dividers included and come molded into the back of the cabinet, finger-grip drawer pulls provide easy access and rear stop tabs prevent contents from spilling

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
